text: Hawa Mahal Vidhan Sabha Constituency is one of the 200 seats of Rajasthan Legislative Assembly. It comes under Jaipur district. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== {| class="wikitable" width=80% |- ! style="background- color:#666666; color:white" colspan="2"|Year ! style="background- color:#666666; color:white"|Member ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white"|Political Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1957 || Ram Kishore Vyas || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 1962 || Durga Lal || Swatantra Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1967 || Durga Lal || Independent |- |style="background-color: " | || 1972 || Girdhari Lal Bhargava || Bharatiya Jana Sangh |- |style="background-color: " | || 1977 || Bhanwar Lal Sharma || Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1980 || Bhanwar Lal Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background- color: " | || 1985 || Bhanwar Lal Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1990 || Bhanwar Lal Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1993 || Bhanwar Lal Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1998 || Bhanwar Lal Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2003 || Surendra Pareek || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2008 || Brij Kishore Sharma || Indian National Congress |- |style="background- color: " | || 2013 || Surendra Pareek || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2018 || Mahesh Joshi || Indian National Congress |- |} ==References== http://www.elections.in/rajasthan/assembly- constituencies/hawamahal.html Category:Assembly constituencies of Rajasthan Category:Jaipur district
